thread.title: Michelle Keegan criticised as 'boring' and 'miserable' on Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway - Manchester Evening News
thread.title_full: Michelle Keegan criticised as 'boring' and 'miserable' on Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway - Manchester Evening News

author: Hayley Minn
title: Michelle Keegan criticised as 'boring' and 'miserable' on Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway - Manchester Evening News
text:
Michelle Keegan criticised as 'boring' and 'miserable' on Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway Coasting through the shift, desperate to get home. We've all been there... Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Michelle Keegan was blasted by Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway viewers for her turn as star guest announcer on last night’s first episode of the series. 
The former Coronation Street actress joined the ITV show to do the voiceover work. 
But viewers of the show were far more impressed with Scarlett Moffatt ’s debut. Read More 
They even accused Michelle of looking “bored”, with one viewer raging: “Why is Michelle Keegan so miserable?!” Michelle was accused of looking miserable... ... and boring 
Another harsh viewer added: “Is Michelle Keegan on diazepam? Dull, fake and dreary.” 
A third blasted: “Michelle Keegan (aka Wright) looks like she can't wait for her shift to be over...not the best guest announcer.” 
While her hard work didn’t go down well with Ant and Dec viewers, Mark Wright’s wife got a lot of love for her stunning looks. 
One viewer shared: “Michelle Keegan is absolutely beautiful. Michelle Keegan is truly stunning.” 
While another agreed: “Michelle Keegan looked incredible on Saturday Night Takeaway #girlcrush.” But looking 'truly stunning' 
Although Michelle didn’t make the best impression on Saturday Night Takeaway viewers, Scarlett left them in hysterics. 
The I’m A Celebrity winner went to find a viewer to ride in a helicopter with her. 
She was seen running around the streets trying to find an Ant and Dec fans waving at their window to sit in the ‘best seats in the house’. 
But Scarlett couldn't find anyone following the instructions - and instead knocked on a random door with a light on. 
*Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway continues on ITV1 on Saturday Like us on Facebook
